Sven Epiney has been confirmed by SRF as the broadcasters’ commentator for the Eurovision Song Contest 2021.
Television presenter and personality Sven Epiney has been confirmed by SRF as the broadcasters commentator for the Eurovision Song Contest 2021 in Rotterdam, Netherlands. Sven has been the commentator for SRF since 2008, having taken over from Bernard Thurnheer who provided commentary in 2007.
Sven Epiney has become the face and voice of the Eurovision Song Contest in Switzerland since becoming the commentator for SRF. He has presented a number of the Swiss selection process and has provided on-the-ground reporting from the contest for SRF.
